name: The Square Game
description:
The Square Game is a 2D action platformer where you can Jump, Spin and Bounce your way though some of the 24 hardest platforming levels EVER MADE*
some side affects may include:
  • Having too much fun
  • Broken controllers
  • Not being able to stop talking about The Square Game
  • Liking squares just a Bit too much
  • Only being able to see squares
  • Becoming a square
  • and being able to taste the colour purple
*(May not actually be the hardest levels ever made test come back inconclusive please contact your doctor before playing The Square Game if you suffer from not being able to git gud)
